title: Func.FileLine behavior does not match funcline in symtab.c
body:
by **girard.m1**: 
Func.FileLine does not return the correct line under certain cases. I have attached a
test file that produce wrong results.

If you compare the two functions, the last condition are not correct in FileLine in
extern.go.

Here is a patch that seems to render a correct stack:
diff:
Attachments: 1. bob.go (525 bytes)
